node.title: Nothing Shall Offend Them
node.description: Jesus warns in Matthew 24 that one of the signs of the times is that "many will be offended", and that it is within this climate of heightened sensitivity and outrage that God's people are to fulfill the gospel commission. This message investigates the current societal issues that fulfill this prediction, and looks to the promise of Psalm 119:165 to see how God's Word offers a solution to these challenges.
